resources

Class MainProgram

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.String[],java.lang.String>
      • resources.MainProgram
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable, java.util.concurrent.Future<java.lang.String[]>, java.util.concurrent.RunnableFuture<java.lang.String[]>

    public class MainProgram
extends javax.swing.SwingWorker<java.lang.String[],java.lang.String>
    Class that implements all the interactions with file system Class implements javax.swing.SwingWorker Class - An abstract class to perform lengthy GUI-interacting tasks in a dedicated thread.
    Author:
    Alexander Artyomov

      • doInBackground

        protected java.lang.String[] doInBackground()
        Function that overrides SwingWorkers doInBackground() and performs search for files that suits user's criteria. The search performed in dedicated thread that runs in background.

      • deleteFiles

        public javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> deleteFiles(javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> l)
        Function that implements deleting algorithm. Function deletes all the files that were found by search and were selected by user to be deleted. At the end function updates the list of files that displayed in Handler window.
        Parameters:
        l - - list of file with selected files to be deleted
        Returns:
        updated list of files

      • archiveFiles

        public javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> archiveFiles(javax.swing.JList<java.lang.String> l)
        Function that implements archive algorithm. Function archives all the files that were found by search and were selected by user to be archived. Function places an archive either in user's DropBox account or saves it on users hard drive, according to users choice. At the end function updates the list of files that displayed in Handler window.Function returns JList of remaining files.
        Parameters:
        l - - list of file with selected files to be compressed to archive.
        Returns:
        updated list of files.

      • now

        public static java.lang.String now()
        Function that returns String representation of current date and time in DATE_FORMAT_NOW format. Function used to generate unique names for new archives
        Returns:
        String representation of current date and time in DATE_FORMAT_NOW format.
